author: cnbc.com
title: Update: Boyden Places Board Members for Goodwill Industries International
text:
Atlanta, April 09, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Boyden, a premier leadership and talent advisory firm, has announced that it partnered in the placements of Joe Guith, President of McAlister’s Deli, Matthew Wadiak, Co-Founder of Blue Apron, and Etienne Patout, former Chief Marketing Officer at Pharmavite, to the Board of Directors for Goodwill Industries International.
“After an exhaustive search, Boyden is enthusiastic about the talent that Joe, Matthew and Etienne bring to the Goodwill team,” said Alicen Blair-Sibly, a Managing Partner of Boyden United States in Atlanta. “Each new board member is integral to the growth of the business.”
About Boyden
Boyden is a premier leadership and talent advisory firm with more than 65 offices in over 40 countries. Our global reach enables us to serve client needs anywhere they conduct business. We connect great companies with great leaders through executive search, interim management and leadership consulting solutions. For further information, visit www.boyden.com .
Dan Margolis Boyden +1 (213) 452-6472 dan.margolis@fticonsulting.com
Source: Boyden
